title: Tikka - Quick Facts
text:
Category | Food and Beverages
Location | Near MT Hall
Cuisines | Veg/Non-veg, South-Indian, Chinese
Closed on | - [ unverified ]
Timings | 10:30AM to 10PM [ unverified ]
Room Delivery | No
Restricted to | None
Seating capacity | 70 [ unverified ]

title: Tikka
text: Tikka is one of the most popular food and snacks spots of IIT Kharagpur. Due to its central location and nearness to the lecture halls in Vikramshila and main building, it enjoys a persistent crowd of people during its operation. Its open seating arena is a casual hangout location.

title: Facilities and cuisines
text: Facility of coupons is the most popular among NCC students . as they are provided with coupons in every events or classes they have of lot of benefits from Tikka .
